entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: A house at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Mentioned as a group that might go and tip someone off.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: A student who can stand at one end of the corridor to warn people not to go down there because of Garroting Gas.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: A student who comes up with a lie about Garroting Gas and suggests standing at either end of the corridor to warn people.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A student who is planning to go under the Invisibility Cloak with Harry to sneak into the office.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character who needs to talk to Sirius and check if he's at home or not.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: A character that Harry wants to talk to. Mentioned as being at home.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: A student who was planning to do something with Garroting Gas before leaving.

entities.name: george
entities.description: A student who was planning to do something with Garroting Gas before leaving.

entities.name: lee
entities.description: A character who has already proved the window's a weak spot.

relationships.description: Harry wants to talk to Sirius while under the Invisibility Cloak.
Hermione knows that Lee has already proved the window's a weak spot.
